item.description:
December Conscious Movie:
10 Questions for the Dalai Lama
Friday, December 4th â€¢ 7:30 p.m.

Movie Description:
This fascinating documentary intertwines an interview with the Dalai Lama, a look back at the history of the spiritual leader and an exploration of the culture of the small city of Dharamsala, India, where His Holiness was exiled 50 years ago. After emailing the Dalai Lama to set up an interview, filmmaker Rick Ray spends the three months until the promised meeting getting a firsthand view of the living conditions and economy in Dharamsala.

Hope to see you there.

*This meetup is free, but donations are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: 2 mins from Stony Brook T-stop orange line; parking available at school across
item.name: December Conscious Movie: 10 Questions for the Dalai Lama
